title: Need For speed Carbon RAZZor.docx
description:
Need For speed Carbon RAZZor-1191 !!

Well like meny of us i could not get the bugger to work and put right at the back of my to do on a shit  Sunday afternoon when the girlfrend not need sex  took me around a year to get to it beliove me had lots of sex and the anser is no to any requsts for photos !!

This worked for me it my not work  for you !!
1.	Download,unpack or put on cd thats up to you ! 

2.	Run setup like any other program/game

3.	Cheek the easy info for compatabilaty ( i had fail on vista system and fail on my gaff card but still got it working)

4.	Insert game key from keygen

5.	Let it load up to hard drive

6.	When finish click quit

7.	You should now sea need for speed carbon tm icon on desk DO NOT DELLITE IT

8.	UNPACK CRACK TO DESKTOP YOU SHOULD HAVE ONE SAYING NFS.EXE

9.	Open hardrive or where you put it 
10.	Right click the crack on desk top nfs.exe and click copy this work for me !!

11.	Go into game dir and click paste !!

12.	Let the computer copy over the old file with the new one and go back to desktop

13.	Double click icon that say NEED FOR SPEED CARBON tm the fist one that i say dont dellite

14.	You should have it up and running !!!

I Whent wrong a year ago by cliking the nfs.exe icon what a tit i am!!!

LIKE I SAY IT MY WORK IT MY NOT BUT DID FOR ME !!
YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT IF YOU WHANT BUT ITS THE SAME AS IN COMMENTS ON THE P?BAY I WILL ONLY SEED FOR HOUR GOT A GAME TO PLAY !! 

HOPE IT WORKS  !!!

BADBOY SOFT!!!
